projectGridLines.title: Deploying Chatbot for dissemination of Health tips to Working Professionals
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

MyEasyPharma Pvt Ltd Bangalore (DPIIT Recognised, Pre-incubated at BITS Pilani, IIM

Lucknow & IIT Patna) not only aims to enhance individual health but also seeks to alleviate the

broader societal burden associated with these health conditions. Improved employee health

can lead to reduced overall healthcare costs, decrease the incidence of chronic diseases, and

enhance the quality of life for individuals, contributing to a healthier society.

Integrate an AI-powered chatbot into the My Easy Pharma app and website to assist customers

with inquiries, personalized health tips, and guidance on using the platform's features. This

project focuses on enhancing customer support and improving user engagement through

conversational AI

Skill sets:

? AI and machine learning basics

? Natural language processing (NLP)

? Chatbot frameworks (Dialogflow, Microsoft Bot Framework)

? Front-end and back-end integration

? API development and integration

? User experience design

Traits expectation:

? Responsible

? Passionate

? Sincere

? Diligent

Expected learning:

? Get hands on experience in Emerging Fields such as AI & ML

? Learn how the HealthTech field functions

? Be associated with a team backed by BITS Pilani, ISB, HBS alumni
